Glider.description: A personal glider you can deploy by pressing Spacebar while in the air.

Headlamp.description: Head mounted light source that illuminates the area in front of you. Press T to turn on and off.

Camp Fire.description: Allows you to cook recipe schematics and helps light up the darkest caves.

Cannon Shells.description: Cannon shells for ship cannons. Can be placed inside the ammo boxes of cannons.

Stove.description: A stove for preparing food and drink on a ship.

Sky Core Atlas Enhancer.description: A sky core upgrade that enhances the Atlas Shards to boost lift by at least 400kg.

Sky Core Generator.description: A sky core upgrade that strengthens its generator to increase life by a minimum of 400kg.

Sky Core Coolant System.description: A sky core upgrade, which prevents overheating, raising lift by a minimum of 600kg.

Sky Core Air Filter.description: A sky core upgrade that purifies incoming air to increase lift by at least 600kg.

Sky Core Stabiliser.description: A sky core upgrade guarding against core instability to increase lift by at least 600kg.

Sky Core Computer.description: A sky core upgrade adding a computer system to manage core upgrades, raising lift by at least 800kg.

Sky Core Circuitry Network.description: A sky core upgrade adding supplementary systems that increase lift by at least 800 kg.

Sky Core Efficiency Module.description: A sky core upgrade that optimises the lift system, increasing lift by a minimum of 800kg.

Makeshift Bandages.description: Basic bandages made from cloth. Can quickly recover a small amount of health.

Nervure Bandages.description: Bandages made with the conductive vessels of creatures. Electrical properties increase the healing effects.

Bent Bar Pipe.description: A bent bar made of piping.

Barrel.description: A Barrel for storing items on ships.

Trunk.description: A small trunk for storing items on ships.

Mounted Box.description: A small box that can be mounted to store items on ships.

Cupboard.description: A cupboard for storing items on ships.

Storage Container.description: A large container for storing items on ships.

Shipping Container.description: An enormous container for storing items on ships.

Bioelectrical Generator.description: Utilises the naturally occuring electricy in creatures to create a power source.

Crows Nest.description: A room with a view atop your ship, perfect for scouting.

Epheremus Drifter.description: Epheremus Drifters were used to briefly subvert the rules of motion to travel short distances under Atlas power.

Figurehead of the Godhand.description: A symbol of order and dominance. Figureheads of the godhand were a common sight over Bandinia.

Figurehead of Telemon.description: A symbol of strength and unity amongst the Saborians. Figureheads depicting the premier led many a warship to glory.

Figurehead of the Raptor.description: The raptor was seen as a symbol of freedom amongst the people of Ishgiru.

Figurehead of the Hawk.description: These figureheads once adorned the war vessel of Astor's legendary band of soldiers, the Karem hawks.

Pirate Flag.description: Your loyalties are with yourself and no one else!

Bossa Flag.description: Show your allegiance to the mighty Bossa Studios.

Improbable Flag.description: Masters of the Grid. Fly your colours with pride and maybe Matej will nail the CSP.

Hip Lamp.description: Small lantern, which can be attached to a belt strap to light the way. Press Y to turn on and off.

Immobilator.description: Temporarily suspend all movement. Momentum is restored afterwards.

Saborian Lamp.description: A fairly standard Saborian ship lamp.

Kioki Lamp.description: A traditional Kioki lamp. It has influences from Pin, Ishgiru and Karem in its design.

Atlas Lifter.description: Anti-gravity device that can be attached to objects to reduce their weight. Unsuitable for use on parts attached to ships due to dangerous atlas field interactions.

Large Panel.description: A larger panel that is more useful for bigger ship hulls.

Window.description: A window set into a small panel that can be attached to a ship's hull.

Power Generator.description: Generators refine fuel to power engines. Interact with them once they are attached to a ship to place fuel inside.

Railing.description: A straight section of a ship's railing.

Railing Corner.description: A corner section of a ship's railing.

Rhegus Greaves.description: Experimental boots from famed inventor Rhegus Dawn. Harnesses atlas to allow walking on any surface.

Stairs.description: A staircase to connect different decks of a ship.

Timed Explosive.description: A big flammable explosive thing with a timer set for 4 seconds, ideal for extracting more metal from metallic core rocks.

Marauder Compass.description: Points you too some Marauder loot.
